oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Relics from Civil War camp site
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Assorted items including bullets, belt buckles, buttons, eagle breast plate, and a state pin for Indiana. Items were found at the site of a Confederate camp area near Dandridge, however most items are Union items. The brass "Ind." pin are found for many Midwestern units on Western theater battlefields, having been sold by sutlers or through mail order to Union troops.
